title: Press Release: Funding Late-Stage Development of M72 TB Vaccine Candidate
description: Wellcome and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation today announced funding to advance a tuberculosis (TB) vaccine candidate, M72/AS01E (M72), through a Phase III clinical trial.
